022
023package org.opt4j.core.optimizer;
024
025import java.util.Set;
026import java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArraySet;
027
028import com.google.inject.Singleton;
029
030/**
031 * <p>
032 * The {@link Control} allows to pause, stop, and terminate, the optimization
033 * process.
034 * </p>
035 * <p>
036 * The {@link Optimizer} calls the methods
037 * <ul>
038 * <li>{@link Control#checkpoint()} and</li>
039 * <li>{@link Control#checkpointStop()}</li>
040 * </ul>
041 * in which the process might get paused, terminated (by the
042 * {@link TerminationException}) or stopped (by the {@link StopException}). By
043 * definition, a {@link StopException} might get thrown only between iterations,
044 * a {@link TerminationException} also within an iteration of the optimization
045 * algorithm. In this context, the optimization algorithm calls
046 * {@link #checkpointStop()} between the iterations and {@link #checkpoint()}
047 * within the iteration.
048 * </p>
049 * 
050 * @author lukasiewycz
051 * 
052 */
053@Singleton
054public class Control {
055
056        protected State state = State.RUNNING;
057
058        protected final Set<ControlListener> listeners = new CopyOnWriteArraySet<>();
059
060        /**
061         * The {@link State} of the control.
062         * 
063         * @author lukasiewycz
064         * 
065         */
066        public enum State {
067                /**
068                 * The running state.
069                 */
070                RUNNING,
071                /**
072                 * The paused state.
073                 */
074                PAUSED,
075                /**
076                 * The stopped state.
077                 */
078                STOPPED,
079                /**
080                 * The terminated state.
081                 */
082                TERMINATED;
083
084                /**
085                 * Returns {@code true} if the current state allows to start the
086                 * optimization.
087                 * 
088                 * @return {@code true} if start is available
089                 */
090                public boolean isStartable() {
091                        return (this == State.PAUSED);
092                }
093
094                /**
095                 * Returns {@code true} if the current state allows to pause the
096                 * optimization.
097                 * 
098                 * @return {@code true} if pause is available
099                 */
100                public boolean isPausable() {
101                        return (this == State.RUNNING);
102                }
103
104                /**
105                 * Returns {@code true} if the current state allows to stop the
106                 * optimization.
107                 * 
108                 * @return {@code true} if stop is available
109                 */
110                public boolean isStoppable() {
111                        return (this != State.TERMINATED);
112                }
113        }
114
115        /**
116         * Starts the optimization.
117         */
118        public synchronized void doStart() {
119                if (state.isStartable()) {
120                        setState(State.RUNNING);
121                }
122        }
123
124        /**
125         * Pauses the optimization.
126         */
127        public synchronized void doPause() {
128                if (state.isPausable()) {
129                        setState(State.PAUSED);
130                }
131        }
132
133        /**
134         * Stops the optimization.
135         */
136        public synchronized void doStop() {
137                if (state.isStoppable()) {
138                        setState(State.STOPPED);
139                }
140        }
141
142        /**
143         * Terminates the optimization.
144         */
145        public synchronized void doTerminate() {
146                setState(State.TERMINATED);
147        }
148
149        /**
150         * Returns {@code true} if the optimization is running.
151         * 
152         * @return {@code true} if the optimization is running
153         */
154        public synchronized boolean isRunning() {
155                return (state == State.RUNNING);
156        }
157
158        /**
159         * Returns {@code true} if the optimization is paused.
160         * 
161         * @return {@code true} if the optimization is paused
162         */
163        public synchronized boolean isPaused() {
164                return (state == State.PAUSED);
165        }
166
167        /**
168         * Returns {@code true} if the optimization is stopped.
169         * 
170         * @return {@code true} if the optimization is stopped
171         */
172        public synchronized boolean isStopped() {
173                return (state == State.STOPPED);
174        }
175
176        /**
177         * Returns {@code true} if the optimization is terminated.
178         * 
179         * @return {@code true} if the optimization is terminated
180         */
181        public synchronized boolean isTerminated() {
182                return (state == State.TERMINATED);
183        }
184
185        /**
186         * A checkpoint that checks for termination.
187         * 
188         * @throws TerminationException
189         *             if the optimization is terminated
190         */
191        public synchronized void checkpoint() throws TerminationException {
192                while (state == State.PAUSED) {
193                        try {
194                                wait();
195                        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
196                        }
197                }
198
199                if (state == State.TERMINATED) {
200                        throw new TerminationException();
201                }
202        }
203
204        /**
205         * A checkpoint that checks for termination and stop.
206         * 
207         * @throws TerminationException
208         *             if the optimization is terminated
209         * @throws StopException
210         *             if the optimization is stopped
211         */
212        public synchronized void checkpointStop() throws TerminationException, StopException {
213                checkpoint();
214                if (state == State.STOPPED) {
215                        throw new StopException();
216                }
217        }
218
219        /**
220         * Returns the state.
221         * 
222         * @return the state
223         */
224        public State getState() {
225                return state;
226        }
227
228        /**
229         * Sets the state and invokes listeners if the state has changed.
230         * 
231         * @param state
232         *            the desired state
233         */
234        protected synchronized void setState(State state) {
235                boolean changed = (this.state != state);
236
237                if (changed) {
238                        this.state = state;
239                        // wake up all potentially waiting (paused) processes
240                        notifyAll();
241
242                        for (ControlListener listener : listeners) {
243                                listener.stateChanged(state);
244                        }
245                }
246        }
247
248        /**
249         * Adds a {@link ControlListener}.
250         * 
251         * @see #removeListener
252         * @param listener
253         *            the listener to add
254         */
255        public void addListener(ControlListener listener) {
256                listeners.add(listener);
257        }
258
259        /**
260         * Removes a {@link ControlListener}.
261         * 
262         * @see #addListener
263         * @param listener
264         *            the listener to remove
265         */
266        public void removeListener(ControlListener listener) {
267                listeners.remove(listener);
268        }
269}
